title: Woman, 32 ‘repeatedly raped boy, 5’
text:
Brandi Naylor faces serious sex offense charges over claims she raped a five year-old boy on two occasions (Pictures: Davidson County Sheriff’s Office/Google Maps)

A 32 year-old woman raped a five year-old boy on two occasions, police say.

Brandy Nicole Naylor, of Davidson County in North Carolina, reportedly targeted the youngster in 2015, and was charged with the horrific sex crimes on Thursday.

Her alleged victim, who is now nine, is said to have disclosed what he had suffered recently.

That saw him taken to The Dragonfly House Children’s Advocacy Center in Mocksville, where the youngster gave a full account of the alleged abuse.

Investigators were sufficiently convinced by the allegations to charge Naylor.

She was being held in Cabarrus County Detention Center on multiple other charges at the time.

They include drugs offenses, assault and death by vehicle.

Naylor, who was charged with two counts of rape and two counts of indecent liberties, is due to appear in court Monday.

Bond for the child sex offenses has been set at $1million.
description: A 32 year-old woman raped a five year-old boy on two occasions, police say. Brandy Nicole Naylor, of Davidson County in North Carolina, reportedly targeted the youngster in 2015, and...
